title: Bug 114905: Default value lost after modifying in list box of report parameter
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please provide the missing steps here]
OB: [Please provide the observed behavior after modifying the default value in the list box]
EB:
Change the Display type to Combo Box

Expected result: The default value should be set as 'aaa'. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.

Actual result: No default value is set. After step 5, the OK button can still be used.
